description.value: -5 Willpower, +5 Fellowship. Gain Literacy, Speak Language (High Gothic), Speak Language (Low Gothic) as untrained Basic Skills. Gain +10 to Interaction Skill Tests when dealing with high authority and formal situations. Add +1 to group's Starting Profit Factor. Gain Peer(Nobility) Talent, and one other Peer talent from Noted List. However also gain some kind of powerful enemy that may make moves against you. Noted List: Academics, Adeptus Mechanicus, Administratum, Astropaths, Ecclesiarchy, Government, Mercantile, Military, or Underworld

skills.name: Speak Language (Low Gothic) as untrained Basic

talents: one other Peer talent from Noted List
